content.need_help: Need help? We are here and we are human.
content.rewax_instructions: Please print your rewaxing service slip and include it with your garment
content.shipping_arrival: You will receive a text message notification when your shipment arrives. In the event that the courier cannot reach you, your shipment will be delivered to the {{ service_point }}.
content.shipping_courier: The shipment courier for your order is {{ courier | upcase }}.
content.shipping_tracking: You can track your shipment delivery status below.
content.service_point: Nearest service point of your shipping location

abandoned_checkout.standard: You left {{ cart_items }} in checkout and haven't completed your purchase. You can complete it now while it's still available and your products are in stock.
abandoned_checkout.discount_first_purchase: You left {{ items }} in checkout and haven't completed your purchase. Because this is your first order with us, we would like to offer you a {{ discount }} discount.
abandoned_checkout.discount_return_customer: You left {{ cart_items }} in checkout and haven't completed your purchase. We appreciate your support and as this is not the first you have ordered with us, we would like to offer you a {{ discount }} discount.

order_confirmation.order: Thanks for your order. Our warehouse staff will begin getting it ready to be shipped. We will notify you when it has been sent with shipment and tracking information. If you have any questions you can reply to this email.
order_confirmation.rewax: Thanks for your rewax service order. You now need to ship your waxed cotton garment to us here in Stockholm, Sweden. Below you will find the shipping address and your rewaxing service slip. Please be sure to print and include the rewaxing service slip with your garment when sending it to us.

shipping_confirmation.complete_fulfillment: Your order has been fulfilled by our warehouse personnel and is on route to your shipping location.
shipping_confirmation.partial_fulfillment: {{ shipped }} {{ shipping | plural: 'item', 'items' }} in your order were fulfilled by our warehouse personnel and are on route to your shipping location.
shipping_confirmation.final_fulfillment: The last {{ shipped | plural: 'item', 'items'| remove: shipped }} in your order were fulfilled by our warehouse personnel and {{ shipped | plural: 'is', 'are'| remove: shipped }} on route to your shipping location.
